examples.korean: It was a difficult situation, when you think about it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 생각해 보면 그 땐 힘든 상황이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: My dad’s always talking about how great everything was back in the day. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 아빠는 옛날 그땐 모든 게 너무 좋았다고 항상 말씀하셔. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: When I pass, speak freely of my shortcomings and my flaws. Learn from them, for I'll have no ego to injure. (Aaron McGruder) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 죽으면 내 단점과 잘못을 주저 없이 말하겠지. 그들의 말에서 배우게나. (그땐) 내겐 상처 입을 자아가 없으니까. (애론 맥그루더, 죽음명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: When I pass, speak freely of my shortcomings and my flaws. Learn from them, for I'll have no ego to injure. (Aaron McGruder) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: And for the season it was winter, and they that know the winters of that country know them to be sharp and violent, and subject to cruel and fierce storms. (William Bradford) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그땐 겨울이었고, 그 나라의 겨울을 아는 사람들은 그곳의 겨울이 매섭고 끔찍할 뿐 아니라 잔인하고 격렬한 폭풍을 동반한다는 것을 알고 있다. (윌리엄 브래드포드, 계절명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: And for the season it was winter, and they that know the winters of that country know them to be sharp and violent, and subject to cruel and fierce storms. (William Bradford) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If everywhere you go somebody asks you to sing, then your destiny is to become a singer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 가는 곳마다 누군가가 노래를 시킨다면 그땐 가수가 될 운명인 거죠. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If everywhere you go somebody asks you to sing, then your destiny is to become a singer. Add to Wordbook
